entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
